info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 28 at 12:40PM PDT until September 28 at 3:45PM PDT by NWS Las Vegas NV
info.description:
FFWVEF
The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... West Central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona...
* Until 345 PM MST.
* At 1240 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Black Mountains north of Golden Valley. Some of this water will drain into the Sacramento Wash and flow through Golden Valley. Also, a shower was producing briefly heavy rain along Highway 68 in Golden Valley. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Golden Valley.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:45 PM PDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 3:45 PM PDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:45 PM PDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:45 PM PDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
